, XVI. After refuting certain erroneous ideas I will set forth

the main features of our religion.

We do not worship an ass’s head. You worship all kinds of beasts and cattle.

If you assert that we pay homage to the cross, you must plead guilty to the same charge.

If we were worshippers of the sun we should only re- semble the Persians3 and our observance of Suu-day is met by your observance of Saturn’s day.

Your latest calumny about us is the monstrous ‘ ass- born deity of the Christians ;' a monstrosity which you surely might well worship: we only smile at the absurdity. '
